description:
in the nova compute the resource tracker log the pci stats as pci_stats=PciDevicePoolList(objects=[PciDevicePool]
and not showing the PciDevicePool values 

it is nova master branch
title: resource tracker incorrect log of  pci stats

comments.content:
in the nova compute the resource tracker log the pci stats as pci_stats=PciDevicePoolList(objects=[PciDevicePool]
and not showing the PciDevicePool values 

it is nova master branch

comments.content:
see in http://144.76.193.39/ci-artifacts/181671/13/Nova-ML2-Sriov/logs/n-cpu.log.gz

2015-09-27 10:00:24.525 INFO nova.compute.resource_tracker [req-094caded-b597-413c-a57f-209409c40aa1 None None] Total usable vcpus: 12, total allocated vcpus: 0

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/227116
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=9421cff9487eb8f0d3fc6494f524056363972e4f
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 9421cff9487eb8f0d3fc6494f524056363972e4f
Author: Moshe Levi <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Sep 23 02:39:02 2015 +0300

    Fix pci_stats logging in resource tracker
    
    In the resource tracker the pci stats is show in
    the log like pci_stats=PciDevicePoolList(objects=[PciDevicePool]
    the patch fix it to be logged as
    pci_stats=[PciDevicePool(count=7,numa_node=None,product_id='1004',
               tags={physical_network='physnet1'},vendor_id='15b3')]
    
    Closes-Bug: #1513467
    Change-Id: I9434bb5cf0ed9eca291df6f4a8b8568b7c3ff4eb
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
